articles.title: WeHo Pride 2023 Parade road closures and route - KTLA Los Angeles
articles.description: On Sunday, the second WeHo Pride Parade is set to take to the streets of West Hollywood. The parade starts at noon on June 4 and runs along Santa Monica Boulevard from Crescent Heights to San Vicente. Ahead of the big event, the city of West Hollywood has clo…
articles.content:

articles.author: Stephanie Giang-Paunon
articles.title: Billy Joel ending New York City residency after selling 1.6 million tickets - Fox Business
articles.description: "Piano Man" crooner and legendary musician Billy Joel, 74, announced his last performance at Madison Square Garden in New York will be in July 2024.
articles.content:
It’s an end of an era for the iconic musician Billy Joel.
The "Movin’ Out" singer will conclude his record-breaking residency at Madison Square Garden (MSG) in New York City.

articles.title: Ranked: 25 best basketball movies, from 'Hoosiers' to LeBron James biopic 'Shooting Stars' - USA TODAY
articles.description: LeBron James is king of the court but how about Hollywood? We're ranking the 25 best basketball movies, including his new biopic "Shooting Stars."
articles.content:
Shaquille O'Neal and Leonardo DiCaprio will probably never share an alley-oop on a fast break, but in the sports movie subgenre of basketball flicks, they're both big stars.
